Building Resilience, Fostering Peace

Peace and Humanitarian Initiative Trust is dedicated to promoting sustainable peace, advancing human rights, and delivering life-saving humanitarian aid to vulnerable communities across the globe.

See Our Strategy Donate

CRITICAL CHALLENGES

Addressing Critical Challenges

In regions affected by conflict, climate change, and poverty, communities face systemic challenges. We are on the ground with a plan to provide critical support.

Conflict & Displacement

Facilitating dialogue and community-driven peacebuilding to reduce violence and create lasting stability.

Climate Disasters

Helping communities prepare for and respond to floods, droughts, and other climate-related emergencies.

Poverty & Inequality

Empowering individuals with vocational training, resources, and opportunities to build self-reliant futures.

Limited Access to Basic Services

Improving access to clean water, food security, and healthcare for crisis-affected populations.

OUR FRAMEWORK

Our Framework for Action

Our work is built on four key pillars that ensure a comprehensive and sustainable impact in the communities we serve.

Humanitarian Relief

Providing immediate, life-saving assistance—food, shelter, and medical care—to communities impacted by natural disasters, displacement, or war.

Conflict Resolution & Peacebuilding

Fostering dialogue, mediation, and reconciliation to reduce violence and build sustainable peace in conflict-affected communities.

Community Empowerment

Supporting local development through education, vocational training, micro-finance, and capacity-building programs.

Human Rights Advocacy

Championing civil liberties, gender equality, and the protection of marginalized groups through policy engagement and grassroots mobilization.

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES

Our Strategic Initiatives

We have developed targeted, community-focused programs to address urgent needs. These initiatives form our roadmap for creating sustainable change in Zimbabwe's most vulnerable districts and are ready for implementation with the support of our partners.

TSHOLOTSHO DISTRICT

Drought and Flood Resilience

This program will reduce community vulnerability through climate-smart agriculture, improved water access, and the establishment of local disaster committees and early warning systems.

Learn About the Plan

CHIPINGE & CHIMANIMANI

Cyclone Preparedness

Following the devastation of Cyclone Idai, this initiative is designed to strengthen community-based preparedness by developing disaster management plans, installing early warning systems, and restoring ecosystems.

Learn About the Plan

BEITBRIDGE DISTRICT

Drought Mitigation and Empowerment

Our goal for Beitbridge is to address chronic food insecurity by constructing solar-powered boreholes, providing drought-resistant seeds, and delivering vocational training to over 5,000 households.

Learn About the Plan

ABOUT PHI

A Foundation of Trust and Commitment

Peace and Humanitarian Initiative Trust (PHI) is a registered non-governmental organization (MA0000063/2019, Protocol 04/19) founded by BASTER WILLIE MAGWIZI and TIMOTHY SITHOLE. We are committed to transparency, accountability, and a community-centered model that prioritizes local voices and sustainable impact.

Partner With Us to Build a Better Future

Your support will help launch these vital initiatives, bringing tangible hope and resilience to communities in need. Join us in turning strategic plans into life-changing action.

Donate Now Become a Partner
